questions.question: What is Dependency Injection?
questions.answer: Dependency Injection (DI) is a design pattern which allows us to handle dependencies in the application with separation of concerns. The idea is to delegate creation of a dependency to the external source, instead of creating it ourselves. Angular has its own implementation of DI.
